room_title: Escape room "Poltergeist" by Escapomania in Ocean City
room_address: 11805 Coastal Hwy Suite I Ocean City, MD 21842
room_description: Eliie Morgan has a nightmare on the night before her school trip to Whitby. Every night Ellie is drawn to the landing outside the mysterious room, which does not seem to exist during the day. This room has a long history of being haunted. Eliie and her friends attempt to unravel the mystery of the room but instead found a series of rather supernatural things occurring within and found themselves locked in from the outside. Now they have 45 minutes to figure out a way to escape or suffer the wrath of the spirit they have angered.
